questions.quote: Well, you should probably ask, because if he's gonna be coming over with those Paccino's pizzas...could be trouble.
I told him I didn't take his Chuckle. I don't eat that gooey crap!
I had to listen to a five minute discussion on which one is actually called shmoopy.
"One hundred percent Cotton Dockers. If they're not Dockers, they're just pants"
See, I don't get that. First they come out with the regular, then a year later they come out with the cherry. They know that we like the cherry, start with cherry! Then come out with the regular!
Bite-size Three Musketeers. Just like the real Peterman eats.
You know, I'm sorry but, I didn't mention it earlier but actually I preferred to be called Maestro.
Ohmygod! Lippman could see this! He thinks I was visiting my father! Oh my g-I make up one little white lie and they put my picture in the paper!
If you know what happened in the Met game, don't say anything, I taped it, hello. Yeah, no, I'm sorry, you have the wrong number. Yeah, no
Because I could get uromycitisis poisoning and die - that's why.
